title._content: Image taken from page 6 of 'Hindu Manners, Customs and Ceremonies ... Translated from the author's later French MS. and edited with notes, corrections, and biography by H. K. Beauchamp. With a prefatory note by the Right Hon. F. Max Müller, etc'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Hindu Manners, Customs and Ceremonies ... Translated from the author's later French MS. and edited with notes, corrections, and biography by H. K. Beauchamp. With a prefatory note by the Right Hon. F. Max Müller, etc" Author: DUBOIS, Jean Antoine. Contributor: BEAUCHAMP, Henry King. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 010056.f.4.", "British Library OC T 4152", "British Library OC T 10511" Volume: 01 Page: 6 Place of Publishing: Oxford Date of Publishing: 1897 Publisher: Clarendon Press Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000991105 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life.
